title: Curvy Brides Boutique
overview: Straight-talking, partners in fashion, Jo Cooke and Alison Law, are transforming wedding dress shopping for plus-size brides to be.With rails full of wedding dresses from size 16 to 40 ready to try on, Jo and Alison are standing by to make sure brides feel amazing on the inside as well as look incredible on the outside.The Curvy Brides Boutique offers a wrap-around hug of a service, that sees Jo and Alison give advice and support every step of the way - from finding the dress they call "the one", right up to walking down the aisle on cloud nine.
